Examines mask/force preference order.

USE=xxxx  (a=on, b=off, x=unset)
    ^---- package.use.mask
     ^--- use.mask
      ^-- package.use.force
       ^- use.force

>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> overlay/profiles/default/use.mask

>>> overlay/profiles/default/package.use.mask
pkg/x  aaaa  aaab  aaax  aaba  aabb  aabx  aaxa  aaxb  aaxx  abaa  abab  abax  abba  abbb  abbx  abxa  abxb  abxx  axaa  axab  axax  axba  axbb  axbx  axxa  axxb  axxx
pkg/x -baaa -baab -baax -baba -babb -babx -baxa -baxb -baxx -bbaa -bbab -bbax -bbba -bbbb -bbbx -bbxa -bbxb -bbxx -bxaa -bxab -bxax -bxba -bxbb -bxbx -bxxa -bxxb -bxxx

>>> overlay/profiles/default/package.use.force
pkg/x aaaa aaab aaax -aaba -aabb -aabx abaa abab abax -abba -abbb -abbx axaa axab axax -axba -axbb -axbx
pkg/x baaa baab baax -baba -babb -babx bbaa bbab bbax -bbba -bbbb -bbbx bxaa bxab bxax -bxba -bxbb -bxbx
pkg/x xaaa xaab xaax -xaba -xabb -xabx xbaa xbab xbax -xbba -xbbb -xbbx xxaa xxab xxax -xxba -xxbb -xbxx

>>> overlay/profiles/categories
pkg

>>> overlay/pkg/x/x-1.ebuild
EAPI=7
SLOT=0
KEYWORDS="*"
IUSE="$(echo {a,b,x}{a,b,x}{a,b,x}{a,b,x})"

>>> expect.use
pkg/x -aaaa -aaab -aaax -aaba -aabb -aabx -aaxa -aaxb -aaxx
pkg/x -abaa -abab -abax -abba -abbb -abbx -abxa -abxb -abxx
pkg/x -axaa -axab -axax -axba -axbb -axbx -axxa -axxb -axxx
pkg/x  baaa  baab  baax -baba -babb -babx  baxa -baxb -baxx
pkg/x  bbaa  bbab  bbax -bbba -bbbb -bbbx  bbxa -bbxb -bbxx
pkg/x  bxaa  bxab  bxax -bxba -bxbb -bxbx  bxxa -bxxb -bxxx
pkg/x -xaaa -xaab -xaax -xaba -xabb -xabx -xaxa -xaxb -xaxx
pkg/x  xbaa  xbab  xbax -xbba -xbbb -xbbx  xbxa -xbxb -xbxx
pkg/x  xxaa  xxab  xxax -xxba -xxbb -xxbx  xxxa -xxxb -xxxx
